name: Chapter of an Ancient Chord
description: Weapon Ascension Material.  Legends say that the survivors of that ancient dynasty once cast a harp out ofblack iron to commemorate and mourn.  A harp cast of black iron cannot be played. To mourn that ancient dynasty thatwas once so proud of its golden music, those remaining forged this heavyinstrument and its yet weightier silence.  But no matter what, the black iron harp remained as silent as that lost era.
